FuncDef: The display qos information command displays statistics about CAR and SQs of a specific user.
CLIs: display qos information user-id <user-id> { inbound | outbound }

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of a user.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 4294967294.

Displays statistics about incoming traffic CAR of a specific user.
-

Displays statistics about outgoing traffic CAR and SQs of a specific user.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display qos information command is used to display statistics about eight Queues.
If SQs are specified, statistics about the SQs are displayed; if CAR is configured, statistics about the CAR are displayed; if both SQs and CAR are specified, statistics about the SQs and CAR are displayed.
Precautions
If an LPUF240 or LPUF120 is equipped with CR5D0LAXFH70, CR5D0LAXFE70,CR5D0L5XFE71, CR5D0L5XFE70,CR5D0EFGFE70, CR5D0EFGFH70,  user-ID-based SQ statistics do not include the precise compensation statistics by default. After the qos tm-schedule traffic-statistics adjustment-packet slot card command is configured, user-ID-based SQ statistics include the precise compensation statistics.
The command used to query the CAR of a specific user does not have a corresponding MIB object.
